name: All For the One, For The One Is All
name_original: All For the One, For The One Is All
description:
The One must feed to grow bigger and stronger, and to spread its reach across the world. Press ENTER to create offspring to feed the One

Press Z and C to switch between the offspring
Use Q/E to rotate and WASD to move the One and its offspring across the world in search of sustenance , and once an offspring has been fully fattened, select it and press X to suck it dry. It is for the sake of the one.

Beware for not all food is friendly. It may be a trap set to poison the One. If an offspring becomes infected, press R to remove it like the cancerous cyst it has become. It is for the best. It would not wish to harm the One for the One is all and all exists to benefit the One
